/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the serene atmosphere. On the left side of the street, there are several cars parked, indicating a bustling city life. On the right side, a building stands out with its red roof, adding a pop of color to the otherwise green and blue landscape. The image beautifully captures the essence of Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
